text: Bataan (; ; ) is a province of the Philippines. It is in the Central Luzon region. The capital is Balanga. ==Gallery== Bataan Capitol 2022.jpg Shrine of Valor Memorial Cross.jpg Death March Km 00.JPG Facade of the St.Dominic de Guzman Church in Abucay, Bataan.jpg Aerial Pictures of the Freeport Area of Bataa(FAB).jpg 01195jfBurgos Hall Center Offices Shrine Pilar Bataanfvf 22.JPG Plaza Mayor de Balanga.png
title: Bataan
